languages.text: "Тогда проси Его вместе со мной о том, чтобы он осветил наш путь и указал то зло, которое мы прибыли истребить. Чтобы никто не укрылся от руки нашей, и кара была воздана".
"Then join me in asking Him to illuminate our path and show us the wickedness that we have come to exterminate. And to let none hide from our hand, and to see retribution served."
languages.original_text: "Тогда проси Его вместе со мной о том, чтобы он осветил наш путь и указал то зло, которое мы прибыли истребить. Чтобы никто не укрылся от руки нашей, и кара была воздана".

traits.locale_text: "Then join me in asking Him to illuminate our path and show us the wickedness that we have arrived to exterminate. And to not let any hide from our hand, and to see the retribution served."
"Then join me in asking Him to illuminate our path and show us the wickedness that we have arrived to exterminate. And to not let any hide from our hand, and to see the retribution served."
"Then join me in asking Him to illuminate our path and show us the wickedness that we have come to exterminate. And to let none hide from our hand, and to see retribution served."
"Then join me in asking Him to illuminate our path and show us the wickedness that we have come to exterminate. And to let none hide from our hand, and to see retribution served."
"Then join me in asking Him to illuminate our path and show us the wickedness that we have come to exterminate. And to let none hide from our hand, and to see retribution served."

languages.text: "Dann lasst Ihn uns gemeinsam bitten, unseren Weg zu erhellen und uns das Übel zu offenbaren, das zu vernichten wir gekommen sind. Auf dass sich niemand vor unserer Hand verbergen und der Vergeltung Genüge getan werden möge."
languages.original_text: "Then join me in asking Him to illuminate our path and show us the wickedness that we have come to exterminate. And to let none hide from our hand, and to see retribution served."

traits.locale_text: "Dann lasst Ihn uns gemeinsam bitten, unseren Weg zu erhellen und uns das Übel zu offenbaren, das zu vernichten wir gekommen sind. Auf dass sich niemand vor unserer Hand verbergen und der Vergeltung Genüge getan werden möge."

languages.text: « Alors, joignez-vous à moi et demandons-Lui d'éclairer nos pas et de nous montrer la corruption que nous sommes {mf|venus|venues} exterminer. Qu'aucun de Ses ennemis n'échappe à notre bras vengeur et que justice soit faite. »
languages.original_text: "Then join me in asking Him to illuminate our path and show us the wickedness that we have come to exterminate. And to let none hide from our hand, and to see retribution served."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, joignez-vous à moi et demandons-Lui d'éclairer nos pas et de nous montrer la corruption que nous sommes {mf|venus|venues} exterminer. Qu'aucun de Ses ennemis n'échappe à notre bras vengeur et que justice soit faite. »

languages.text: 「ならば、我らの行く手を照らし、我らが退けるべき悪しき行為を示してくださるよう、共に祈ろう。そして、誰も我々の手から隠れることなく、報いを受けさせることができるように」
languages.original_text: "Then join me in asking Him to illuminate our path and show us the wickedness that we have come to exterminate. And to let none hide from our hand, and to see retribution served."

traits.locale_text: 「ならば、我らの行く手を照らし、我らが退けるべき悪しき行為を示してくださるよう、共に祈ろう。そして、誰も我々の手から隠れることなく、報いを受けさせることができるように」

languages.text: «En ese caso, pídale conmigo que ilumine nuestro camino y nos muestre la maldad que hemos venido a exterminar. Y que no deje que nada se oculte a nuestra justicia».
languages.original_text: "Then join me in asking Him to illuminate our path and show us the wickedness that we have come to exterminate. And to let none hide from our hand, and to see retribution served."

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso, pídale conmigo que ilumine nuestro camino y nos muestre la maldad que hemos venido a exterminar. Y que no deje que nada se oculte a nuestra justicia».

languages.text: “既然如此，和我一起向祂祈祷吧，愿祂照亮我们的道路，让我们看清眼前的一切邪恶。愿祂保佑我们不放过任何邪恶之徒，让祂所有敌人都得到应得的报应。”
languages.original_text: "Then join me in asking Him to illuminate our path and show us the wickedness that we have come to exterminate. And to let none hide from our hand, and to see retribution served."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，和我一起向祂祈祷吧，愿祂照亮我们的道路，让我们看清眼前的一切邪恶。愿祂保佑我们不放过任何邪恶之徒，让祂所有敌人都得到应得的报应。”

languages.text: "Öyleyse bana katıl. Birlikte O'ndan yolumuzu aydınlatmasını ve yok etmeye geldiğimiz kötülüğü bize göstermesini isteyelim. Bir de elimizden kimsenin kaçmamasını ve cezalandırılması gerekenin cezalandırılmasını."
languages.original_text: "Then join me in asking Him to illuminate our path and show us the wickedness that we have come to exterminate. And to let none hide from our hand, and to see retribution served."
